title: Humor-Based Foreign Language Mobile Learning Course for Economic Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic economics theories and intermediate English reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Video-centric microlearning environment utilizing learners' personal devices. Provides humorous video content for foreign language learning of economic concepts

learning_goals: Learners extract five key economic concepts from humor video content presented in English with 80% accuracy.
Learners solve over 75% of theoretical application problems in performance assessments after video learning.
Learners create video content review plans using metacognitive strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
